docs: Only TRVC admin is able to deposit collateral tokens on TRVC ATA.

docs: Only TRVC admin is able to withdraw collateral tokens from TRVC ATA.

docs: Only TRVC admin is able to repay zSOL on TRVC

errors.name: InvalidAccountData

errors.msg: The deposit amount should be less than the deposit cap
